project_abstract.cdata: The project would develop some 200,000 ha of virgin land in Heilongjiang Province for the production of food grains and soybean. Principal features of the project would be drainage works; larger and more modern agricultural machinery for full mechanization of farming operations; construction equipment; and provision of roads, housing and supporting infrastructure. Training in equipment operation and maintenance and in construction techniques would be provided together with technical assistance (78 man-months of consultant services) in the fields of planning, training, and seed production. The project would produce more than 440,000 tons of grain and soybean annually, and thereby help reduce China's food grain deficit. It would serve as a large-scale trial and demonstration of techniques applicable to an additional 470,000 ha of uncultivated land and some 2 million ha now cultivated by state farms in Heilongjiang.

P003412.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>黑龙江农垦项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将在黑龙江省开发20万公顷未开垦地，用于主食粮和大豆生产。项目资助的主要内容包括排水工程、全面实现农业机械化所需的大型现代化农业机械、施工设备以及道路、住房和辅助设施建设。项目将提供设备运行维护和施工技术方面的培训，也将提供规划、培训和种子生产等方面的技术援助（相当于78个人月的咨询服务）。项目每年将生产超过44万吨粮食和大豆，从而帮助缩小中国的主食粮缺口。项目将对黑龙江省另外47万公顷未耕地和目前有国营农场耕种的200万公顷左右农田适用的方法进行大规模试点和示范。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
